pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena upāsakā ārāmaṃ āgacchanti dhammassavanāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.3: Dhamme bhāsite therā bhikkhū yathāvihāraṃ gacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.4: Navakā bhikkhū tattheva upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ muṭṭhassatī, asampajānā, naggā, vikūjamānā, kākacchamānā seyyaṃ kappenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.6: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā naggā vikūjamānā kākacchamānā seyyaṃ kappessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.7: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.8: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.10: Atha kho te bhikkhū te navake bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.11: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappentī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.14: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.16: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.17: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.18: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.1: Atha kho bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena kosambī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena kosambī tadavasari. Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati badarikārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.4: “bhagavatā, āvuso rāhula, sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ—‘na anupasampannena sahaseyyā kappetabbā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.6: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo seyyaṃ alabhamāno vaccakuṭiyā seyyaṃ kappesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.7: Atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya yena vaccakuṭi tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ukkāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.12: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.13: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.15: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.16: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.30: catutthe divase atthaṅgate sūriye, anupasampanne nipanne, bhikkhu nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.31: Bhikkhu nipanne, anupasampanno nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:3.2.1: Anupasampanne anupasampannasaññī uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:3.2.2: Anupasampanne vematiko uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:3.2.3: Anupasampanne upasampannasaññī uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:3.3.2: dvetisso rattiyo vasati, ūnakadvetisso rattiyo vasati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:3.3.3: dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati,
